service.title: Fetch Metadata Request Headers
service.documentation: This document defines a set of Fetch metadata request headers that aim to provide servers with enough information to make a priori decisions about whether or not to service a request based on the way it was made, and the context in which it will be used.

http-header.documentation: The Sec-Fetch-Dest HTTP request header exposes a request's destination to a server.
The Sec-Fetch-Mode HTTP request header exposes a request's mode to a server.
The Sec-Fetch-Site HTTP request header exposes the relationship between a request initiator’s origin and its target’s origin.
The Sec-Fetch-User HTTP request header exposes whether or not a navigation request was triggered by user activation.
